shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000

shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000

shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.100*( 0.60*sin(0.933*time) + 0.40*sin(1.045*time) );
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.050*( 0.60*sin(0.900*time) + 0.40*sin(0.956*time) );
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.500*( 0.60*sin(0.700*time) + 0.40*sin(0.300*time) );
per_frame_4=mv_r = mv_r + bass*2;
per_frame_5=mv_g = mv_g + treb*2;
per_frame_6=mv_b = mv_b + mid*2;
per_frame_7=mv_y = 1.25;
per_frame_8=zoom = zoom+(bass_att-0.8)*0.2;
per_frame_9=
per_pixel_1=rot =(0.1*bass)-rad * 3-2+(0.5*rad-10-(0.5*rad-3*time)- 0.2*bass_att);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`    
warp_6=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_7=`    ret = ret- (ret*.5);
warp_8=`    ret = ret*(abs(GetBlur2(uv)-.5))*5;
warp_9=`    ret = ret - .01;
warp_10=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 uv_echo = (uv - 0.5)*1*float2(-1,1) + .5;
comp_4=`    ret = max(ret, tex2D(sampler_main, uv + 0.06*float2(cos(uv.y*27*0.5),sin(uv.x*39*0.5))).xyz);
comp_5=`    ret = lerp( tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz, 
comp_6=`                tex2D(sampler_main, uv_echo).xyz, 
comp_7=`                0.50 
comp_8=`              ); //video echo
comp_9=`    
comp_10=`    ret *= 4.60/rad; //gamma
comp_11=`    ret *= ret; //darken
comp_12=`    //float L = lum(ret)*rad;
comp_13=`    
comp_14=`    ret = float3(1.1,0.8,0.7)*ret.x*(1.1+sin(time*.83)) +
comp_15=`          float3(1,.7,0.65)*ret.y*(1.1+sin(time*1.3)) + 
comp_16=`          float3(1.0,0.8,0.7)*ret.z*(1.1+sin(time*.92));
comp_17=`  
comp_18=`    //ret = ret*ret * (1.3 + ret.xyz);
comp_19=`    
comp_20=`    ret -= 1/rad;
comp_21=`}
